crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: MALWARE-CNC Win.Trojan.Revenge RAT inbound heartbeat check
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"MALWARE-CNC Win.Trojan.Revenge RAT inbound heartbeat check"; flow:to_client,established; content:"PNC|2A 2D 5D|NK|5B 2D 2A|",depth 11; metadata:impact_flag red,policy balanced-ips drop,policy max-detect-ips drop,policy security-ips drop,ruleset community; reference:url,www.virustotal.com/en/file/518f7803ad1b8e630f50719d7cb3638ea5d67fa4d4387a55f44ddca4ef55a3ee/analysis/; reference:url,www.virustotal.com/en/file/79bdbf9ec639d5ccf3992e9c9fe9eeba21d191dc168194a80b50f3aa8068892a/analysis/; reference:url,www.virustotal.com/en/file/edb115dd5ca7c7f9dd069746daa0a4ee6298bf94de62510d3f8bebfa5f5a8bcd/analysis/; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:45962; rev:1; )

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO DNS Query for Port Mapping/Tunneling Service Domain (.portmap .host)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DNS Query for Port Mapping/Tunneling Service Domain (.portmap .host)"; dns.query; content:".portmap.host"; nocase; endswith; reference:url,portmap.io; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2047872; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_09_01, deployment Perimeter, deployment Internal, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_09_01, reviewed_at 2023_09_01;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY DNS Query to a Reverse Proxy Service Observed
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET POLICY DNS Query to a Reverse Proxy Service Observed"; dns.query; content:".portmap."; nocase; pcre:"/^(?:com|io|host)/Ri"; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2027941; rev:3; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2019_09_03, deployment Perimeter, confidence Medium, signature_severity Major, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2020_10_27;)

attributes.magic: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386 Mono/.Net assembly, for MS Windows

threat_severity.level_description: Severity MEDIUM because it was considered trojan.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the suspicious RUN keys created by software located in Download or temporary Outlook/Internet Explorer directories
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poude (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)
